skycrash.name: Skycrash
skycrash.desc: Leap towards your enemies and stomp, knocking up enemies caught.

sovereign drive.name: Sovereign Drive
sovereign drive.desc: Dash forward in a blink, knocking down enemies in your path.

warp kick.name: Warp Kick
warp kick.desc: Perform a kick, then warp to your enemies for a second followup kick.
